name: viewport-cli
description: Responsive design auditing tool - capture screenshots across multiple viewports with zero manual setup
author: law-makers

scripts.build:linux: cd cli && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../bin/platform-binaries/linux-x64/viewport-cli main.go
scripts.build:macos-x64: cd cli && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../bin/platform-binaries/macos-x64/viewport-cli main.go
scripts.build:macos-arm64: cd cli && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../bin/platform-binaries/macos-arm64/viewport-cli main.go
scripts.build:windows: cd cli && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../bin/platform-binaries/windows-x64/viewport-cli.exe main.go
scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos-x64 && npm run build:macos-arm64 && npm run build:windows && echo 'âœ… All platforms built successfully'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:all && npm run test
